column1: dismayed several member of the clergy due to alarmingly loud snores drowning out the pre-dinner prayers
nearly shot the waiter because there was a fly in their soup
caused alarm at their manhandling of the groom during the reception
was the subject of much scorn for loudly expressed political views
got very drunk and interrupted the ceremony
received a frosty reception from the happy couple
was beloved by all the guests
caused uproar and fury amongst the guests with loud
was highly amusing throughout the day
displayed a baboon's etiquette in front of the other guests
shamed the bride with unwanted flattery
angered the groom and nearly came to fisticuffs with the bride's father
was shown home early after consuming far too much strong drink
was found the next day in the maid's chambers
declared the whole occassion a disgrace and left early
